titleStmt.title: A proposition or message, sent the 31 of Decemb. 1641. to His Majestie, by the House of Commons, for a guard. Together with His Majesties gracious answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

titleStmt.title: A proposition or message, sent the 31 of Decemb. 1641. to His Majestie, by the House of Commons, for a guard. Together with His Majesties gracious answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Thomason 131[7] is "A Proposition or message, sent the 31. of Decemb. 1641 .."; Thomason 131[8] is "His Majesties ansvver to the message, or proposition ..". Paging is separate, register is continuous.
"His Majesties answer to the message, or proposition .." is signed at end: "White-Hall, 3. Jan. 1641.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And
